remarks: Value of a translation in terms of an associated atom. ~ cdleme48fvg with simpler hypotheses.  TODO:  Use ~ ltrnj to vastly simplify. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2013.)
statement:
cdlemg2inv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg2inv.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg2j.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemg2fv $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) ) /\ ( F e. T /\ ( P .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) = X ) ) -> ( F ` X ) = ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) ) $.
